version_description:
- Uygulama girişinde bazı kullanıcıların yaşadığı problemler giderildi.
- İyileştirmeler yapıldı.
You can now make money transfer between ininal cards via app and you can create new virtual cards for your online shopping.
• Improvements made on user interface.

• Top-up with Credit or Debit Card feature has been developed.
• Login without One Time Password feature has been developed.
• Summary Page bug has been fixed.

•The feature to remove saved credit / debit cards has been developed.
•Forgot Password flow has been updated.
•Contact Us page has been updated.

• The feature to remove saved credit / debit cards has been developed.
• Forgot Password flow has been updated.
• Contact Us page has been updated.
• Bug fixes.

- Payment with Bravo card at Multinet merchants by using QR code feature has been developed.
- Bug fixes.

We want to make it easier for you to pay your bills so we developed the Bill Payment feature with your ininal card.
We have noticed some bugs and problems you notice when using ininal Wallet and we fixed them all!

Last but not least, we also have new ininal cards specially designed for real gamers!

- Bring your buddy to ininal, win prizes

We wanted to develop a way to thank our users who brought friends to ininal. With our new feature we now reward our users who have made their friends ininal users and users registering with a ininal user’s invite code. Share your invitation code, earn rewards for your friends.

- Epins of your favorite games are in ininal Wallet!

The Epins for hundreds of games are now in ininal Wallet. You can buy the Epins of your favorite games in the ininal Wallet with just a few clicks.

We continue to improve ininal Wallet for you. So what have we done so far?

- Minor bugs and problems were fixed which are all about system problems.
- Performance improvements have been made to provide you a better experience.

For all your feedback, please do not forget to leave a comment and rate us. :)
- Bugs fixed

We completely renewed ininal Wallet for you! 

With new version of ininal Wallet, you will have a different experience with a brand new user
interface.
You can be an ininal user with only your cell phone number and email address in seconds!
For all your questions and comments you can contact us on social media accounts or e-mail address.

We continue to improve ininal Wallet for you.

- Some problems have been solved.
- Performance improvements have been made.

For all your feedbacks, you can reach us at urundestek@ininal.com.

We continue to improve ininal Wallet for you. So what have we done so far?

- You can now pay your bills through the app, we have more than 300 institutions for you.
- Performance improvements have been made to provide you a better experience.

For all your feedback, please do not forget to leave a comment and rate us.

We continue to improve ininal Wallet for you. So what have we done so far?

- You will see our new user agreement with this new version of ininal wallet.
- Performance improvements have been made to provide you a better experience.

For all your feedback, please do not forget to leave a comment and rate us.

For all your feedback, please do not forget to leave a comment and rate us.

We continue to improve ininal Wallet for you!
Hooray, cash withdrawal is now available! :) Thank you for your patience! Update your app to take advantage of all the ininal Card features!
So what have we done in this release?

- Cash withdrawal is live! (Yey!) :)
- All bugs are fixed.
- We've made performance improvements to provide a better experience.
- Design improvements have been made to give our users a better experience.
- In this version of ininal Wallet, we renewed the User Agreement!
Don't forget to comment and rate! Contact us for any feedback and improvement suggestions :)

We continue to improve ininal Wallet for you. So what have we done so far?

- If you have a cancelled ininal VISA Card with some balance in it, now you can transfer that amount to other cards without any fee.
- Minor bugs and problems were fixed.
- Performance improvements have been made to provide you a better experience.

For all your feedback, please do not forget to leave a comment and rate us.

For all your feedback, please do not forget to leave a comment and rate us.

We continue to improve ininal Wallet for you. So what have we done so far?

-From now on, you can change your card pin code as you wish. Just click on your ininal card located on the homepage and under "card operations" choose change password.

For all your feedback, please do not forget to leave a comment and rate us.

We continue to improve ininal Wallet for you

To increase the security of our app, from now on we'll be requiring our users to include the last 4 digits of their ininal card number in addition to the barcode number when adding a new ininal card to their account

Please do not forget to leave a comment and rate us

We introduced a lot of improvement in this release.

We have renewed our navigation menu. You can easily access money transfer and money top-up screens with one click.

You can now view the necessary information regarding how to top-up your ininal card via EFT or bank transfer within your app and share this information with anyone you like.

Also, you can update your profile details with ease. To update your e-mail address or mobile number, just go to your profile page and click "update profile details".

Do not forget to leave a comment and rate us.

With this release we're entering the era of ininal Plus. From now on you can have an account with 50.000TL limit by verifying your ID.
To have ininal Plus, all you have to do is:
1. Take a photo of your ID
2. Take a selfie
3. Take a photo of your bill or your certificate of residence
4. Make a digital signature
5. Print our contract, sign it and upload its photo.
You can apply to ininal Plus by clicking the Increase my Limit button in your Account Details page.

Sevgili ininallı,
İşte ininal’dan sana yepyeni bir özellik: Banka hesabına para transferi!
Artık ininal Kart’ından istediğin banka hesabına para gönderimi yapabilirsin. Hem de gece gündüz demeden, 7/24.
Bunun için:
“Para gönder” menüsüne gir
“Bankaya transfer” seçeneğini seç.
Ardından göndermek istediğin kişinin adını ve IBAN numarasını girerek yolla.
İşte bu kadar basit.
Görüş ve önerilerin için yorum yapmayı ve puan vermeyi unutma.

We continue to improve ininal Wallet for you.
With this release you will be able to check our ongoing campaigns from the app. We’ve also made some performance improvements and bug fixes.
Please do not forget to leave a comment and rate us.

From now on you can login with 6 digit numeric passwords.
Do not forget to leave a comment or rate us.

ininal Cüzdan’ı senin için geliştirmeye devam ediyoruz.
Bu güncellemede performans geliştirmeleri yaptık ve bazı küçük hataları giderdik.
Her türlü görüş ve önerilerin için yorum yapmayı ve puan vermeyi unutma.

Pay with QR code and enjoy %5 discount on all Multinet restaurants.
All you have to do is to click “Pay with QR code” on the home page. You can find all the restaurants listed and the QR payment screen.
Do not forget to leave a comment or rate us.

With our new release, you can send money to crypto markets with ease. Just select the crypto market you want and send money 7/24.
Do not forget to leave a comment or rate us.

We continue to improve ininal Wallet for you.
From now on to be a ininal Plus user, you don’t need to upload a bill. You can simply input your registered address to verify your address.
Please do not forget to leave a comment and rate us.

We continue to improve ininal Wallet for you.
From now on you can easily open foreign currency accounts and directly buy and sell EUR or USD from ininal.
Please do not forget to leave a comment and rate us.
